recursive subroutine generate_permutations(current, remaining, perms, index)

  character(len=*), intent(in) :: current, remaining

  character(len=*), dimension(:), intent(out) :: perms

  integer, intent(inout) :: index

  

  if(len_trim(remaining) == 0) then

    perms(index) = current

    index = index +1

  else

    integer :: i, len_rem

    len_rem = len_trim(remaining)

    do i=1, len_rem

      character(len=len_trim(remaining)) :: rem_cpy = remaining

      character(len=1) :: c

      c = rem_cpy(i:i)

      rem_cpy = rem_cpy(1:i-1) //

recursive subroutine generate_permutations( current_str, remaining_str, perms, index )
    character(len=*), intent(in) :: current_str, remaining_str
    character(len=*), dimension(:), intent(out) :: perms
    integer, intent(inout) :: index
    integer :: len_rem, i

            call generate_permutations( current_str // remaining_str(i:i), temp_rem, perms, index )
        end do
    end if

program permutation_distance_calculator
    implicit none

    integer :: n, factorial, posA, posB, index_cnt
    integer :: i
    character(len=:), allocatable :: perms(:)
    character(len=:), allocatable :: line1, line2
    character(len=:), allocatable :: number_str

    read(*, *) n
    
    ! Read the two input lines:

    allocate( character(len=n) :: line1, source = ' ' )
    allocate( character(len=n) :: line2, source = ' ' )
    
    call read_line(n, line1)
    call read_line(n, line2)
    
    ! Construct number string:
    character(len=n) :: temp_num
    do i = 1, n
        temp_num(i:i) = char(ichar('0') + i)
    end do
    number_str = trim(temp_num)
    
    ! Compute factorial of n
    factorial = 1
    do i = 2, n
        factorial = factorial * i
    end do
    
    allocate( character(len = n), dimension(factorial) :: perms )
    
    ! Initialize permutation list:
    index_cnt = 1
    
    ! Call permutation generation:
    call generate_permutations("", number_str, perms, index_cnt)
    
    ! Find positions of the lines:
    posA = 0
    posB = 0
    
    do i = 1, factorial
        if (perms(i) == line1) then
            posA = i
        end if
        if (perms(i) == line2) then
            posB = i
        end if
    end do
    
    print*, abs(posA - posB)
    
contains

    subroutine read_line(n, str)
        implicit none
        integer, intent(in) :: n
        character(len=*), intent(out) :: str
        
        integer, dimension(n) :: input_values
        integer :: i
        
        read *, input_values
        
        do i = 1, n
            write(str(i:i), fmt='(i1)') input_values(i)
        end do
    end subroutine read_line

    recursive subroutine generate_permutations(current, remaining, perms, index_count)
        implicit none
        character(len=*), intent(in) :: current, remaining
        character(len=*), dimension(:), intent(inout) :: perms
        integer, intent(inout) :: index_count
        integer :: len_remaining, i
        character(len= len_trim(remaining)), allocatable :: temp_remaining
        
        if ( len_trim(remaining) == 0 ) then
            perms(index_count) = current
            index_count = index_count + 1
        else
            len_remaining = len_trim(remaining)
            do i = 1, len_remaining
                temp_remaining = remaining(1:i-1) // remaining(i+1:)
                call generate_permutations(current // remaining(i:i), temp_remaining, perms, index_count)
            end do
        end if
    end subroutine generate_permutations
end program permutation_distance_calculator
